    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Arena
    Represents the combat area where the pieces fight each other.
    ArenaScreen
    Represents the Screen where the chess arena combat takes place.
    AttackListener
    Interface for handling attack events in a chess game.
    ChessBoard
    Represents the chess board with pieces and game logic.
    ChessGame
    ApplicationListener implementation shared by all platforms.
    ConfigurationManager
    Represents the configuration manager for the chess game.
    GameScreen
    Represents the Screen where the normal chess game takes place.
    GameState
    Represents the state of the ChessBoard and manages user input.
    IntRect
    Represents a rectangle with integer coordinates and properties.
    Lwjgl3Launcher
    Launches the desktop (LWJGL3) application.
    MenuScreen
    Represents the main menu screen of the chess game.
    PieceInfo
    Represents a chess piece with its properties and actions.
    PieceMovementHandler
    Represents the movement handler for chess pieces in the game.
    PieceType
    Enum class representing the piece types.
    Projectile
    Represents a projectile in the arena.
    PromotionDialog
    Represents the promoting dialog menu of the chess game.
    PromotionListener
    Interface for handling pawn promotion events in the chess game.
    Rules
    Defines the rules for the valid moves of chess pieces on the chess board.
    ScoreBoardManager
    Represents the scoreboard manager for the chess game.
    ScoreBoardScreen
    Represents the scoreboard screen of the chess game.
    SettingsScreen
    Represents the settings screen of the chess game.
    StartupHelper
    Adds some utilities to ensure that the JVM was started with the -XstartOnFirstThread argument, which is required on macOS for LWJGL 3 to function.
    TargetPoint
    Representing a point on the chess board with floating-point coordinates.
    Team
    Enum class representing the teams.
    TextureLoader
    Represents a utility class for loading textures of chess pieces.
